abstract: Orbis Investment Management, a major shareholder of Nikko Cordial, stepped up pressure on Citigroup to raise its $14 billion bid for the Japanese broker by offering to sell its stake on the open market at a higher price. Analysts dismissed the move, which offers the shares at a price well above their current market value.
